hero.title: Empowering 7 Million Indian Artisans
hero.subtitle: Direct trade platform that increases artisan earnings by 3-5x through AI-powered tools and eliminating middlemen

artisan.title: For Artisans
artisan.description: Sell your GI-tagged crafts directly to global buyers with AI-powered quality certification

buyer.title: For Buyers
buyer.description: Source authentic Indian handicrafts with verified quality and ESG compliance

featureHighlight.title: AI-Powered Cultural Negotiation Engine
featureHighlight.description: Our Gemini AI engine doesn't just translate - it understands cultural context. When a German buyer requests a price reduction, we suggest appropriate counter-offers in the artisan's regional language, dramatically increasing deal closure rates.
featureHighlight.result: Result: 3x higher negotiation success rate compared to generic translation tools

quality.title: AI Quality Grading
quality.description: Gemini AI analyzes craftsmanship, materials, and finishing quality with 98.5% accuracy. Automatic export compliance checking for 50+ countries with Premium, Standard, and Economy grade classification.

translation.title: Multilingual Translation
translation.description: Real-time translation with cultural context for 15+ languages including Hindi, Telugu, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, Bengali, Gujarati, Marathi, Punjabi, Odia, and Assamese.

logistics.title: Cluster Logistics Optimization
logistics.description: AI-powered logistics pooling aggregates orders from artisan clusters for consolidated shipping, achieving 60-75% cost reduction on international deliveries.

documentation.title: Export Documentation Automation
documentation.description: Automatically generates commercial invoices, packing lists, certificates of origin, and country-specific customs forms for seamless international trade.

payment.title: Secure Payment Processing
payment.description: Integrated with Stripe and Razorpay for international payments. Smart escrow system ensures artisans receive payment upon shipment confirmation.

gi.title: GI Tag Authentication
gi.description: Verify Geographical Indication products including Kanjivaram silk, Kashmir Pashmina, Jaipur block prints, Channapatna toys, and 400+ registered Indian handicrafts.

step1.title: Artisan Uploads Product
step1.description: Upload photos via web or WhatsApp. AI generates professional listings in 15 languages.

step2.title: AI Quality Assessment
step2.description: GPT-4 Vision checks quality against international standards. Assigns Premium/Standard/Economy grade.

step3.title: Global Discovery
step3.description: Buyers worldwide discover authentic products with verified quality certificates and GI tags.

step4.title: Cultural Negotiation
step4.description: Real-time chat with context-aware translation. AI suggests culturally appropriate offers.

step5.title: Order & Payment
step5.description: Secure checkout. Auto-generated export docs. Smart escrow releases payment on delivery.

step6.title: Pooled Shipping
step6.description: Orders from nearby artisans consolidated into bulk shipments. Track globally.
